item.title: Reflections on RStudio::conf2018
item.description: photo up top We’re driving north on I-5, passing brown hills and palm trees, San Deigo in the rear view. The smell of last night’s beach bonfire on our jackets in the back seat wafts up front, and Google Maps tells us we’re 7 hours from our destination: Berkeley and Davis, CA. For the past two days, we attended RStudio::conf2018, a gathering of about 1,500 R users, programmers, data scientics, academics, and tidyverse hex sticker afficionados.
